body: Hi Renata! Sophia asked me to help her deploy and experiment, but I didn't know how to do it. Andrew told me he'd show me how to do it for the future, but said I first needed to ask you to create me a private cloud user, which will then allow me to access our team's build server.
I haven't done this in forever but let me see what I can do...
I think I got it. Your username is your company shortname. And I believe I need to secure email this password to you, one second...
Let me know if you got it.
Just got it! HAHAHAHAHAHA!!! How did you know?!

I thought you'd get a kick out of that! I'm good friends with your old manager from your previous internship here, and it was the first thing she told me when I mentioned that you were joining our team.
...I admit it, I am one of those crazy fans!
Also kudos for even getting the number correct!
